title:
I asked about the containers at the Port quite some time ago and was told I would be contacted by e-mail.  I have not heard a word and am wondering if anything was ever done about my request.



I would appreciate hearing something if it is only -- we are ignoring that request.



Thank you.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10052
